![Unlock Protocol Adds Support for $DEGEN ðŸŽ©](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/baaa0b13a54abeff9edec94b47ee54c7.png)

<p>Unlock Protocol has added support for $DEGEN for creators, event organizers, and others building on Unlock Protocol.</p><p>Projects launching subscriptions, memberships, events, and other initiatives using Unlock Protocol can now accept purchases and payments using $DEGEN. If you are setting up a paid subscription, membership or event and want to price it in $DEGEN, you can now do so.</p><p>As we are seeing community-driven tokens gain broader acceptance and utility, we are seeing increased growth, liquidity, and contributions to a more inclusive (and interesting) digital economy.</p><p>Tokens like $DEGEN are reshaping the interaction between communities and economies, accelerating a decentralized and participatory onchain environment. (Here are some great thoughts on this from <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://darkstar.mirror.xyz/L8ilT6K6urKFE6MN5TItUX1IArTAn4gIpC1FtB5s2xs">Jarrod Dicker</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://tpan.substack.com/p/281-memecoins-are-here-to-stay">TPan</a> and, of course, the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://warpcast.com/~/channel/degen">/degen channel on Warpcast</a>.)</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-how-to-price-things-in-dollardegen">How to price things in $DEGEN</h2></div><p>If a creator or event organizer wants to price their offering natively in $DEGEN, you now have the ability to set up $DEGEN as the method of payment.</p><p>When setting up a smart contract with Unlock Protocol, deploy that smart contract on Base and use the $DEGEN ERC-20 as your pricing using the $DEGEN token (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://basescan.org/token/0x4ed4e862860bed51a9570b96d89af5e1b0efefed">0x4ed4e862860bed51a9570b96d89af5e1b0efefed</a>). It will now show its price in $DEGEN.</p><p>Hereâ€™s what it looks like in practice. It takes about a minute to set up.</p><div data-type="youtube" videoid="oYBhRZE6CSA">
      <div class="youtube-player" data-id="oYBhRZE6CSA" style="background-image: url('https://i.ytimg.com/vi/oYBhRZE6CSA/hqdefault.jpg'); background-size: cover; background-position: center">
        <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oYBhRZE6CSA">
          <img src="/images/blog/unlock-protocol-adds-support-for--degen---/play.png" class="play">
        </a>
      </div></div><p>Once the smart contract has been updated, we can take a look at how itâ€™s presented for subscribers or attendees who are making a purchase.</p><p>Head over to <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.unlock-protocol.com/event/eth-galactic-2025-based">https://app.unlock-protocol.com/event/eth-galactic-2025-based</a> for a live example.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-protocol-adds-support-for--degen---/6489b71553d5d4fe0142c39dd5b6949e.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1844" nextwidth="2612" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>The landing page shows $DEGEN as the method of payment, and the checkout flow for this event now shows $DEGEN as the way to pay for the ticket to this event.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-protocol-adds-support-for--degen---/0db3e96d4ee92651ddaccc992bff757b.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1848" nextwidth="2638" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p><strong><em>Note:</em></strong><em> Pricing in $DEGEN is </em><strong><em>not</em></strong><em> limited to event tickets. Any type of onchain subscription, automatically recurring subscription, or membership can be priced in $DEGEN using Unlock Protocol.</em></p><p>You can get started at <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://unlock-protocol.com">https://unlock-protocol.com</a>.</p><p>Enjoy! <span data-name="top_hat" class="emoji" data-type="emoji">ðŸŽ©</span></p><p></p>
